name: Piper Black
description:
Piper Black is an exterminator working under his father, but his childhood was anything but ordinary.

CONTENT WARNINGS: Murder and implications of murder, implications of a child murder, emotional(?) child abuse, exposure of violence/death to a child, misgendering of a transmasc character, self misgendering, visible blood, ambient BGM that some might find unsettling.

This is a short kinetic visual novel. It was made in about a week for the Only One of Any Asset (O2A2) Visual Novel Jam!

The game features...

  • 995 words
  • 1 (long) illustration
  • 1 BGM track
  • 1 SE

It also features...

  • An edgy little horror story
  • A transmasc wasian protagonist. Don't you love race and gender?
  • Second person narration
  • A funky vertical orientation due to my own carelessness with planning -- we make do!

Aaand... the credits!

  • Font: Latin Modern Mono by GUST e-foundry
  • BGM: Thriller Ambient by unfa
  • SE: Ticking Clock 1 by Sonoptic
  • Art, writing, and shoddy programming by me!

Thank you for checking out my first (finished) visual novel!
